onboarding_question_date_4to5.message_text: Sorry, this date is invalid. Please write your child's date of birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.
The date you entered is in the future. Please write your child's date of birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.

According to the date you gave, Your Child would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-6. If your child is aged 2-6, please write the date for your child's birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.
Your Child is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. Is that correct?
Let's try again. Please write your child's date of birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.

According to the date you gave, Your Child would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-6. If your child is aged 2-6, please write the date for your child's birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.

settings_lang_profile_data.current_info_msg: You are currently receiving messages in
settings_lang_profile_data.update_inquiry: Would you like to change your language?

wa_templates.name: daily_interaction
wa_templates.text:
I've got another lesson ready for you! Are you ready to continue with your goal, {{1}}?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

wa_templates.name: home_activity
wa_templates.text:
Youre doing great towards your goal, {{1}}. Were you able to {{2}}?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. Not yet

wa_templates.name: first_module_intro
wa_templates.text:
Its time to get started on your goal, {{1}}. Are you ready?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes!
2. Remind me tomorrow

wa_templates.name: start_started_mod_or_change_goal
wa_templates.text:
You're almost finished with this goal! {{1}} What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. {{2}}
2. Leave this goal unfinished and select a new goal

wa_templates.name: unfinished_onboarding
wa_templates.text:
ParentText has begun. Are you ready to complete your registration?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. Remind me Later

wa_templates.name: select_goal
wa_templates.text:
You have made great progress. Are you ready to select your next parenting goal?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. Remind me Later

wa_templates.name: no_response
wa_templates.text: These messages dont seem to be working. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.

wa_templates.name: post_goal_checkin
wa_templates.text: Today we are taking a break from your goal, {{1}}, and checking in on your progress. Press 1 on your keypad to proceed.

wa_templates.name: complete_start_module
wa_templates.text:
Youre off track! Do you want to complete a previous skill or start a new skill?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Complete
2. Start new

OLD_uncaught_message_flow.message_text:
I don't understand your message.
Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.
You have not given consent to participate in this programme. Would you like to participate?

If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type {START}. 
We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
Parenting is hard. ParentText may help. You've completed @fields.n_goals_completed out of @fields.n_goals_prog parenting goals. Would you like to continue your progress?

That's okay. If you ever decide to come back, type {START}. 
We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
